Package my.uum

Class Player

java.lang.Object
my.uum.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This class is to managing player information.

    • checkContestant

      public boolean checkContestant​(int telegramid, int tournamentid)
      This method is for check whether this telegram ID had joined tournament that user entered.
      Parameters:
      telegramid - user Telegram ID.
      tournamentid - Tournament ID entered by user
      Returns:
      status of check. If true mean this Telegram ID had joined this tournament and in contrast.

      Returns:
      status of checking. If true mean this Telegram ID had registered as golfer and in contrast.

    • checkmarker

      public boolean checkmarker​(int golferid, int tournamentid)
      This method is for checking whether the golfer ID as marker is exist in database.
      Parameters:
      golferid - Golfer ID of the marker
      tournamentid - Tournament ID
      Returns:
      status of checking. If true mean this golfer ID is exist in database.

      Parameters:
      golferid - Player Golfer ID.
      holeno - Score of the hole

      tournamentid - Tournament ID
      score - Player score
      Returns:

    • checkhole

      public boolean checkhole​(int golferid, int holeno, int tournamentid)
      This method is for checking whether the hole number of player entered had stored score or not.
      Parameters:
      golferid - Golfer ID
      holeno - Hole number
      tournamentid - Tournament ID
      Returns:
      status checking. If true the hole number player entered already had a score.
